rows.label: qev086004_MSG0042
rows.name: A thorough inspection turned up a transfer loss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0041
rows.name:
To notice something like this...
Lin-san really is amazing, isn't she?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0001
rows.name:
I brought the part!
I'll swap it out right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0002
rows.name:
Amazing...
The transmission loss is unmeasurable now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0004
rows.name: Food-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0005
rows.name: Lin-san, that's impressive[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0006
rows.name:
I think this will hold for a while...
But is that really good enough?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0007
rows.name: Huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0008
rows.name:
That part'll eventually wear out,
and then we'll be back to square one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0009
rows.name: Just ending the work like this feels[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0010
rows.name:
Noooo~~!
Tatsu's dinner is being postponed-meh~~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0011
rows.name:
I understand how you feel, Lin.
But Tatsu also seems to be at his limit[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0012
rows.name: What do you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_JNK0010
rows.name: Side with Tatsu

rows.label: qev086004_SEL0011
rows.name: Look to the sky and say you're starving too.

rows.label: qev086004_JNK0020
rows.name: Side with Lin

rows.label: qev086004_SEL0021
rows.name: Shake your head, saying half-measures aren't good enough.

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0013
rows.name:
Right. If we make him wait any longer,
Tatsu might starve to death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0014
rows.name: But[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0015
rows.name: It's alright, Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0016
rows.name:
If a problem occurs, we'll take responsibility
and go collect parts again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0017
rows.name:
Okay... right.
If anything happens, please contact me right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0018
rows.name: You got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0019
rows.name:
Alright, sorry for making you wait, Tatsu.
Let's head back to BLADE Home and eat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0020
rows.name: Yay, meh~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0021
rows.name: Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0022
rows.name:
There's a limit to the parts from the White Whale.
Eventually, they'll run out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0023
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0024
rows.name:
We really should make it possible to produce
high-precision parts here in NLA, shouldn't we?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0025
rows.name:
True, if we could do that, even if a problem occurred,
we could replace the part immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0026
rows.name: Why haven't we been able to do that until now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0027
rows.name: It's a resource issue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0028
rows.name:
In some ways, it's actually more difficult
than searching for parts from the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0029
rows.name:
There are three types of materials needed. All of them
are hard to come by on this planet Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0030
rows.name:
But if we find them, future maintenance
will become easier, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0031
rows.name:
Then we should search for them!
It might have been difficult before, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0032
rows.name: Now Elma's team has everyone together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0033
rows.name:
Alright.
Lin certainly has a point[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0034
rows.name: Let's see this mission through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0035
rows.name: Aaargh! Tatsu's dinner is postponed again-meh~~![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0036
rows.name:
Sorry, Tatsu.
But right now, as BLADE member, I want to prioritize this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0037
rows.name:
In return, when the mission is over,
I'll make you a feast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0038
rows.name: A feast-meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0039
rows.name:
Hearing that, even Tatsu feels a sense of mission
as a BLADE member sprouting-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086004_MSG0040
rows.name: Let's finish the mission quickly-meh![ST:wait ]
